description:
Protect your boards in transit. The spacious main compartment opens wide for easy access, and is lined with durable, coated polyester. A comfy padded carry strap and grab handle provide a couple of carry options, with a lockable zipper for security and oversized zipper pull loops that accommodate gloved fingers in frigid resort lots.

  • Outer fabric is burly 600d polyester, lined with polyurethane and treated with DWR for reliable water resistance
  • Padded interior is lined with 600d polyester laminated with waterproof TPE
  • Roomy inner pocket with zip closure
  • Comfortable carry strap with padded handle
  • Beefy, lockable zipper
  • Oversized plastic pull loops for easy opening and closing with gloved hands
  • Reflective logo detail
  • Fits boards up to 165 cm
name: MEC Fresh Tracks Padded Snowboard Bag
